abstract: After reading this week's column, a reader named Anne Garcia sent an email to say that Ikea sells 9-inch plates for just 79 cents apiece. The plates are part of the Motto line, and I have no idea how nice they are. But a 9-inch diameter is impressively small for any dinner plate that isn't an antique. I just did a Google search on "small dinner plates," and all of the sizes listed on the first page of results were more than 9 inches. The plates also cost a whole lot more than 79 cents.
